channel.title: Oracle on Welcome to my site
channel.description: Recent content in Oracle on Welcome to my site

item.title: Free Functions as a service
item.description: Intro Five minutes (almost!) to always free functions as a service courtesy of Oracle Cloud The full source code for this project is here. Why do this? All the major cloud providers offer some level of free service, however Oracle cloud is the only one offering this much compute free forever. Yeah but why Oracle? Okay you got me. I got sucked into their free tier. Plus I like the way they describe instances sizes/flavours as shapes.
